body:
@alalazo  It looks like PR #670 might have broken "spack uninstall -f".  Can you please look into it?

```
[me@ankeli icebin]$ spack uninstall -f openblas
==> The following packages will be uninstalled : 


==> Do you want to proceed ? [y/n]
y
[me@ankeli icebin]$ ls /home/rpfische/spack/opt/spack/linux-x86_64/gcc-4.9.3/openblas-0.2.17-lvi5fks7zompzclvc2lyzwilfefal4ld/lib
blas.a  cmake  libblas.a  liblapack.a  libopenblas.a  libopenblas_nehalemp-r0.2.17.a
```
title: `spack uninstall -f` is broken
